p: The antifungal and antimycotoxin experiments were performed individualistically for six replicates ( n = 6) and the results were stated as mean ± SD. The data were processed by one-way ANOVA following Tukey’s multiple comparison post hoc test using GraphPad Prism 7 trial version (GraphPad Software, Inc., United States). The statistical variances between the experimental sets were measured significant at p < 0.05.
